articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Union starts further 24-hour stoppage at Chevron's Australian LNG facilities - Reuters
articles.description: Australia's Offshore Alliance union said on Sunday that workers had begun a second 24-hour strike at Chevron's liquefied natural gas (LNG) plants in Western Australia.
articles.content:
SYDNEY, Sept 17 (Reuters) - Australia's Offshore Alliance union said on Sunday that workers had begun a second 24-hour strike at Chevron's liquefied natural gas (LNG) plants in Western Australia.
